title: [Large-scale] Remote Teacher Training Program: Strengthening Language Education Competencies Based on Deep Learning Design (Integrating Text Analysis, Writing, and Reading)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory knowledge and teaching experience, basic grammar/vocabulary knowledge for language instruction, reading/writing competency
context.additional_context: A language education competency development program combining self-directed learning and deep learning design in non-real-time digital device-based learning environments. Focus is placed on enhancing learners' expressive/reading comprehension skills and strengthening educational material design capabilities.

learning_goals: Learners apply in-depth learning strategies using SLM (Self-learning Materials) in workplace environments with over 80% accuracy and analyze text structures and vocabulary usage patterns in linguistic materials
Learners propose three or more solutions to practical problems in language education design (e.g., grammar error correction, expression diversification) through peer feedback and case analysis
Learners achieve over 90% monthly learning goal attainment rates (reading accuracy, writing completeness) through LMS-based formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
